queryobj.querysql: select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,i.instanceName,i.deptName,i.CompanyName,instanceState,i.EmployeeName,i._CreateTime,i.AppName,d.WorkflowCode ,i.FinishTime,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeName(i._AutoId) ActiveNode,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeEmployee(i._AutoID) ActiveEmployee,d.workflowName,DATEDIFF(d,i._createTime,getdate()) Days from t_e_wf_instance i inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowId=d._autoid) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|
